Articles.Content:
True. I was in a choir.

The user below me is fastidious about their laundry.

False. I just throw it in the machine all sorted and call it a day.

true, i'm using my laptop

the user below me has visited every planet in KSP

If crashing counts.

The user below me will say true (it's a paradox ;3)

False. It's not a paradox i can easily say false.

The user below me will tell a lie. (that IS a paradox)

True. I am eight feet tall. (You didn't specify that my answer is a lie )

The user below me hates paradoxes.

False. Love 'em all the way. ULTRA EPIC PORTAL 2 REFERENCE: "This... statement... is... false!" "Um... i choose true"

The user below me likes this game.

It's cool.

The user below me despises ketchup and mustard.

true i don't like the taste

the user below me plays skyrim

Negatory. I only play KSP, Minecraft, and some other, smaller games.

The user below me is interested in soccer/football.

Kinda. I dont like watching it a lot, but i like being defender. (PS: I hate being goalkeeper)

The user below me thinks that indie games are mostly more fun than normal ones.

True. They're willing to take more risks in non-traditional gameplay.

The user below me has been in a helicopter.

Ohoho NO thank you xP

The user below me flew an aircraft.

Nope.

The user below me has played Dokapon Kingdom.

False. What is it? oh i see... didnt play.

The user below me plays europa universalis 4.

false i have never even heard of it

the user below me is excited about Alien:Isolation and plays bioshock

false. just false.

the user below thought this game is dead

False - I didn't know it existed!

User below me will not write a joke to entertain us.

True. lol

The user below me isn't male.

False. I am a male

The person below me knows pigs from minecraft.

False. I used to just bake and eat them.

The user below me personally knows cows from Minecraft.
